name: Snowbreak (Slenderquil)
description:
Snowbreak is a game made in SRPG studio that blends time management and strategy RPG elements. Taking control of Roland's team, you'll participate in Darris' 15th annual tournament in hopes of winning the grand prize, the Snowbreak Sword.

Features

  • Strategy RPG elements- Position units and use weapon ranges to maximize damage given and minimize damage received
  • A central hub world- Explore the city of Darris to purchase items, converse with NPCs, and spend your ingame time
  • Time management- Spend each day exploring for items and levels or conversing with allies to gain skills to prepare for Fights in the Arena
  • Arena fights- Each round of the tournament will have you face off against increasingly stronger foes in order to obtain the legendary Snowbreak
  • No permadeath- Please don't reset when a unit dies I beg of you

Created for Anarch16Synch's SRPG Studio One-for-All-Jam.  Things such as more dialogue, proper ally conversations, updated sprites, and extra maps are planned to be added some time after the jam is over.
